questions.question: What is Mock App?
questions.answer: Mock App is a demonstration application designed to showcase features and functionality.

questions.question: How do I sign up?
questions.answer: You can sign up by clicking on the 'Sign Up' button and following the registration process.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, Mock App offers a 14-day free trial for all new users.

readyToGetStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
